body:
See https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/21398 and https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/24622

- Change `config: use_curl: True | False`  to `config: url_fetch_method: curl | urllib` for clarity 
- Documentation of url_fetch_method in defaults/config.yaml
- Default fetch option explicitly set to `urllib` for users who may not have curl on their system
title: document config option "url_fetch_method"
